SELECT lecture_code ,notice_lecture_code ,notice_lecture_title ,info_lecture_code ,institution_code ,institution_name ,member_teacher_code ,member_teacher_name ,notice_lecture_start_date ,notice_lecture_end_date ,lecture_class_days ,left(lecture_date, 10) AS lecture_date FROM lecture WHERE institution_code = #{institutionCode}

SELECT lecture_code ,notice_lecture_code ,notice_lecture_title ,info_lecture_code ,institution_code ,institution_name ,member_teacher_code ,member_teacher_name ,notice_lecture_start_date ,notice_lecture_end_date ,lecture_class_days ,left(lecture_date, 10) AS lecture_date FROM lecture WHERE lecture_code = #{lectureCode}

SELECT notice_lecture_code ,info_lecture_code ,member_teacher_code ,member_teacher_name ,classroom_code ,notice_lecture_title ,institution_code ,institution_name ,classroom_maximum_no ,notice_lecture_minimum_no ,notice_lecture_current_applicant_no ,left(notice_lecture_recruitment_start_date, 10) AS notice_lecture_recruitment_start_date ,left(notice_lecture_recruitment_end_date, 10) AS notice_lecture_recruitment_end_date ,left(notice_lecture_result_date, 10) AS notice_lecture_result_date ,notice_lecture_fee ,left(notice_lecture_start_date, 10) AS notice_lecture_start_date ,left(notice_lecture_end_date, 10) AS notice_lecture_end_date ,notice_lecture_status FROM notice_lecture WHERE institution_code = #{institutionCode} AND notice_lecture_status = '모집중' ORDER BY notice_lecture_recruitment_start_date DESC
